channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oracle’s stock surged on billions in new cloud contracts. Can it fund its AI promise?
item.description: Oracle’s massive data-center buildout will require the company to take on new financing strategies — and new risks.

item.title: Goodbye Zillow surfing? How megamergers in the real-estate industry could impact home buyers.
item.description: Three years of terrible home sales have made the residential real-estate industry more territorial. That could be bad news for home buyers and sellers...

item.title: ‘My monthly expenses are $6,500’: I’m 64, have $1.2 million in a 401(k) and two mortgages. Can I afford to retire?
Constellation Brands’ results lift stock, but executives warn consumers remain ‘depressed’
item.description: Shares of Constellation Brands Inc. rose after hours Monday after the beer and wine maker reported quarterly results that beat expectations and stuck ...

item.title: ‘People need to be more concerned with outliving inflation than Social Security’: I retired at 61, but went back to work. Was I right?
item.description: “I am 66 and working full time. I’d rather be retired.”

item.title: Utility stocks are benefiting from the AI boom. This one could be the next to break out
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down an interesting triangle chart pattern forming in one utility.

item.title: Peter Lynch on why he isn't in the AI trade: 'I literally couldn't pronounce Nvidia until about 8 months ago'
item.description: Lynch described himself as "low tech" and emphasized the importance of understanding the stocks you own.

item.title: M&A is coming back in a big way in banking. A top analyst believes these are the next takeouts
item.description: Mike Mayo said the setup reminds him of the 1990s, when consolidation swept through regional and community banks following waves of regulatory relief.

item.title: Nvidia is still trading at a reasonable price despite hitting an all-time high last week

item.description: Galaxy Digital introduced a commission-free trading platform, Galaxy One, which offers services similar to those of Robinhood.
